text: 10:14 Aposel 18:6Egh gumazitam ia inigh uan dɨpenimɨn mangan aghuagh, egh ian akam baraghan koghtɨ, ia dɨpenir kam o nguibar kam ataghɨraghamim dughiam, ia uan dagaribar itir mɨneziba apɨsigh.10:14 Suren gumaziba arazir kam damutɨma, nguibar ekiamɨn itir gumazamiziba gan fogh suam, me arazir kuram gami. Nɨ Mak 6:11 ko Aposel 13:51ɨn gan.
